data.oai_dc:dc: # ind_data: Site (sampled site, 21 sites), ind (individual predator ID, nested within Site), pred_spp (predator taxonomic identity, 4 spp), prey_tax (prey taxonomic identity, 17 categories), log10_PredSize (log10-transformed predator lenght), log10_PPSRpref (Preferred individual-link Predator-Prey Size Ratio). # pop_data: Site (sampled site), beta (degree of size-dependence of average Predator-Prey Size Ratios), beta_SE (beta standard error), Vbeta (degree of size-dependence of the variance in Predator-Prey Size Ratios), Vbeta_SE (Vbeta standard error).
